title: Geek Lust
description: Don't believe the old adage men don't make passes at girls who wear glasses! Boys and girls in glasses are doing quite fine getting it on in libraries, offices and at conferences to name a few places that become dens of inequity. This anthology will have you hot under the collar when you see someone in glasses or a bowtie. Contributors to this anthology Kaysee Renee Robichaud, Madlyn March, Beckah Rose, Kimber Vale, Jeanine McAdam, Max Vos and more. Be prepared to defog your glasses whether you wear them or not!
author: F. Leonora Solomon
